hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin Beta Spike Post-ETH Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a confirmed ETH breakout (>5% gain with volume >20% above 20-day average), high-beta meme coins (DOGE, PEPE, TRUMP) will outperform ETH by a factor of 1.5-2x over the next 48 hours, but only during BULL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: ETH breakouts during bull markets signal risk-on expansion. Meme coins, as highest-beta expressions of crypto sentiment, attract leveraged speculation from traders extrapolating the ETH move.
entry_conditions: ETH daily close up >5% on volume >120% of 20-day average
Enter selected meme coin at next open after ETH breakout confirmation
Meme coin must have 30-day beta to ETH > 1.2
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 55% of signals result in meme coin outperforming ETH over the 48-hour window.
